about_the_game:
Swingularity is a space golf game set across an infinite multiverse brimming with 2.5D planets, stars, and celestial hazards. Bogey, par, or birdie your way through both tailored and procedurally generated courses. Let the cosmos become your fairway…

Harness the gravitational forces of Newtonian mechanics to slingshot around planets and stars. With a sophisticated space-time overlay, you can estimate the perfect angle and power for that elusive hole-in-one.

Forget mundane sand-traps and lakes. In Swingularity, you’ll evade the fiery heat of stars, weave through the deadly beams of quasars, and even send your ball flying through black holes. Each galaxy offers a unique combination of hazards and obstacles that challenge you to master the art of cosmic golf.

  • Please note that the demo is a sample experience, and does not include all of the celestial hazards featured above.

The main campaign is just the beginning! Wishlist the full game to experience a limitless multiverse filled with procedurally generated courses. Enter any seed and discover a brand-new experience, ensuring that no two holes are ever the same.

Swingularity is a space golf game set across an infinite multiverse brimming with 2.5D planets, stars, and celestial hazards. Bogey, par, or birdie your way through both tailored and procedurally generated courses. Let the cosmos become your fairway…

Harness the gravitational forces of Newtonian mechanics to slingshot around planets and stars. With a sophisticated space-time overlay, you can estimate the perfect angle and power for that elusive hole-in-one.

Forget mundane sand-traps and lakes. In Swingularity, you’ll evade the fiery heat of stars, weave through the deadly beams of quasars, and even send your ball flying through black holes. Each galaxy offers a unique combination of hazards and obstacles that challenge you to master the art of cosmic golf.

  • Please note that the demo is a sample experience, and does not include all of the celestial hazards featured above.

The main campaign is just the beginning! Wishlist the full game to experience a limitless multiverse filled with procedurally generated courses. Enter any seed and discover a brand-new experience, ensuring that no two holes are ever the same.
name: Swingularity Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 9th Gen Intel i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel IGPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 10th Gen Intel i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: An indie space golf game set across an infinite multiverse filled with stylized planets, stars, and other celestial wonders. Bogey, par, or birdie your way through tailored and procedurally generated courses. In Swingularity, the cosmos becomes your fairway.
